uAchieve Learning Center

uAchieve's Website

Summer 2015

Solo Dev/Web Master

For uAchieve Learning Center I provided a simplistic method of handling sign-ups. Through the website I built, parents can easily register their children into the learning center. Utilizing a mobile-first, responsive design approach, uAchieve is able to reach out to more customers online. Giving users of all devices a beautiful visual experience. I am the webmaster of the project handling their domain, SEO, and server.
